name: GigZoo
slogan: We use technology to redefine the way talent get booked for gigs
description:
GigZoo is the first online platform allowing high quality, digitally verified and insured talent to be booked instantly for events. 

We have partnered with Zego, Passbase and MangoPay to integrate insurance, ID verification and payments into one platform. 

GigZoo uses design and technology to provide the most affordable, convenient and secure method of booking talent.

GigZoo provides talent with the tools required to monetise their skills & manage their gigging career independently and securely - without the need for an expensive agency.

team.title: CEO
team.name: Anjan Luthra
team.bioHtml: Founder @GigZoo • Former PE & VC investor @Partners Group • Former @Ernst & Young Consultant • Ex International Cricket and Tennis player for Scotland

jobs.title: HIRING DESPITE COVID - Marketing Manager
jobs.description:
Are you passionate about music? Do you want to be a key member of a fast growing business helping musicians and entertainers build their careers?  We’re putting a band together to do just that, and we’re looking for talent. 

**About GigZoo**

GigZoo is a London-based start-up, disrupting the live entertainment market. Our custom-built platform makes booking entertainment for any occasion 10x easier and faster.

With integrated on-demand insurance, secure payments and AI-powered digital ID verification, we are the only online platform where you can instantly and securely book the best entertainers in the UK. All in one place. 

**About the role:**

After recently launching our product and closing our seed round of investment, we are ready to build our go-to-market team. 

The Marketing Manager will lead and execute our growth strategy to acquire entertainers (supply) and customers (demand) through different channels. We’re looking for someone who has a passion for music and live events and has 4+ years of marketing experience at an online marketplace (B2B / B2C).

You will work closely with our founder, product lead, designer, external agency and development team to understand the business needs and then plan and execute our growth campaign.

This is a permanent role on a full-time basis, and you will be based in our Central London office. 

**What you will do:**

•	Research, interview entertainers/customers and learn the dynamics of our marketplace platform and its role in the live entertainment ecosystem.
•	You will have primary responsibility for driving lead generation across the supply and demand side of the marketplace (i.e. acquiring entertainers and customers seeking to book entertainers).
•	Directly grow organic and paid channels including PPC, SEO, email, social, website, offline events and others. 
•	Identify, test and implement new B2C and B2B marketing tactics across channels and continuously evolve our marketing plan. 
•	Maximise our marketing budget for maximum growth within our defined CPA’s
•	Design and implement tracking plans, reporting on marketing metrics. 
•	Creating and undertaking split tests to ensure we’re always learning and iterating to improve acquisition, conversion and retention of customers
•	Taking initiative to tap into seasonal, topical and location-based opportunities (e.g. summer events, Christmas events, music school collaborations)
•	Creating and optimising display and retargeting campaigns to drive B2B and B2C leads through the funnel

**Who you are:**

•	You have 4+ years hands-on experience in product, analytics, or marketing & growth for B2C / B2B online marketplaces
•	You have a passion for music, live events and want to improve the market for musicians 
•	You have a resilient personality, seek autonomy and have a desire to build a business
•	You are an excellent communicator (written and oral)
•	You are a focussed and creative problem-solver with an inquisitive and technical mindset
•	You are a pro-active self-starter and enjoy working as part of a small team, rapidly iterating on approach and getting your hands dirty to deliver on the result
•	You have a growth-hacker mindset / personality and enjoy finding innovative ways of maximising value 
•	You have managed marketing campaigns on a large scale with proven results 
•	You have good experience in SEO & marketing in organic channels 
•	You are data-driven, always looking to understand the numbers behind everything you do 
•	You are confident analysing campaign results using common analytics tools 
•	You have an eye for design and a flair for great copy (bonus if you can execute design and copy)
•	You are confident in managing agencies and freelancers 
•	You have experience in organising and running marketing events

**What GigZoo offers:**

•	Exciting, passionate and friendly team that work hard and have fun
•	Responsibility, autonomy and a voice at the table from day one
•	You will be instrumental in the growth of a disruptive start-up backed by capital from leading investors across Europe
•	Generous compensation package comprised of base salary, performance related bonus and opportunity to earn an equity ownership package
•	33 days annual leave (including bank holidays)
•	Learning, development, and networking opportunities across the entertainment and tech industries 
•	Professional development, health and wellbeing budget  
•	Mates rates on your own entertainment bookings
•	Central London office (Finsbury Circus) with a flexible working culture – we like to give freedom but also value the power of collaboration 
•	A day off to volunteer for a cause of your choice 
•	Regular team lunches 
•	Defined contribution pension

**NO RECRUITMENT AGENCIES**
jobs.descriptionHtml:
Are you passionate about music? Do you want to be a key member of a fast growing business helping musicians and entertainers build their careers? We’re putting a band together to do just that, and we’re looking for talent.

About GigZoo

GigZoo is a London-based start-up, disrupting the live entertainment market. Our custom-built platform makes booking entertainment for any occasion 10x easier and faster.

With integrated on-demand insurance, secure payments and AI-powered digital ID verification, we are the only online platform where you can instantly and securely book the best entertainers in the UK. All in one place.

About the role:

After recently launching our product and closing our seed round of investment, we are ready to build our go-to-market team.

The Marketing Manager will lead and execute our growth strategy to acquire entertainers (supply) and customers (demand) through different channels. We’re looking for someone who has a passion for music and live events and has 4+ years of marketing experience at an online marketplace (B2B / B2C).

You will work closely with our founder, product lead, designer, external agency and development team to understand the business needs and then plan and execute our growth campaign.

This is a permanent role on a full-time basis, and you will be based in our Central London office.

What you will do:

• Research, interview entertainers/customers and learn the dynamics of our marketplace platform and its role in the live entertainment ecosystem.
• You will have primary responsibility for driving lead generation across the supply and demand side of the marketplace (i.e. acquiring entertainers and customers seeking to book entertainers).
• Directly grow organic and paid channels including PPC, SEO, email, social, website, offline events and others.
• Identify, test and implement new B2C and B2B marketing tactics across channels and continuously evolve our marketing plan.
• Maximise our marketing budget for maximum growth within our defined CPA’s
• Design and implement tracking plans, reporting on marketing metrics.
• Creating and undertaking split tests to ensure we’re always learning and iterating to improve acquisition, conversion and retention of customers
• Taking initiative to tap into seasonal, topical and location-based opportunities (e.g. summer events, Christmas events, music school collaborations)
• Creating and optimising display and retargeting campaigns to drive B2B and B2C leads through the funnel

Who you are:

• You have 4+ years hands-on experience in product, analytics, or marketing & growth for B2C / B2B online marketplaces
• You have a passion for music, live events and want to improve the market for musicians
• You have a resilient personality, seek autonomy and have a desire to build a business
• You are an excellent communicator (written and oral)
• You are a focussed and creative problem-solver with an inquisitive and technical mindset
• You are a pro-active self-starter and enjoy working as part of a small team, rapidly iterating on approach and getting your hands dirty to deliver on the result
• You have a growth-hacker mindset / personality and enjoy finding innovative ways of maximising value
• You have managed marketing campaigns on a large scale with proven results
• You have good experience in SEO & marketing in organic channels
• You are data-driven, always looking to understand the numbers behind everything you do
• You are confident analysing campaign results using common analytics tools
• You have an eye for design and a flair for great copy (bonus if you can execute design and copy)
• You are confident in managing agencies and freelancers
• You have experience in organising and running marketing events

What GigZoo offers:

• Exciting, passionate and friendly team that work hard and have fun
• Responsibility, autonomy and a voice at the table from day one
• You will be instrumental in the growth of a disruptive start-up backed by capital from leading investors across Europe
• Generous compensation package comprised of base salary, performance related bonus and opportunity to earn an equity ownership package
• 33 days annual leave (including bank holidays)
• Learning, development, and networking opportunities across the entertainment and tech industries
• Professional development, health and wellbeing budget

• Mates rates on your own entertainment bookings
• Central London office (Finsbury Circus) with a flexible working culture – we like to give freedom but also value the power of collaboration
• A day off to volunteer for a cause of your choice
• Regular team lunches
• Defined contribution pension

NO RECRUITMENT AGENCIES

jobs.title: HIRING DESPITE COVID - Senior Full Stack Developer
jobs.description:
Are you passionate about music? Do you want to be a key member of a fast growing business helping musicians and entertainers build their careers?  We’re putting a band together to do just that, and we’re looking for talent.

**About GigZoo:**

GigZoo is a London-based start-up, disrupting the live entertainment market. Our custom-built platform makes booking entertainment for any occasion 10x easier and faster.

Following our rapid fundraising, we are hiring a full stack developer to co-lead our product development function in London. You will play an integral role in scaling GigZoo as part of a high calibre team backed by several leading private investors.

**Principal duties and responsibilities:**

- Work closely with the CEO and Product Development team based in London.

- Develop, test and maintain core aspects of the platform as well as developing and implementing exiting new features.

- Identify and analyse platform enhancement opportunities, and then select ad implement the best solutions.

- Active involvement in other aspects of product development, such as analysis, design, troubleshooting and optimisation.

- Provide support in critical/urgent situations.

**Knowledge, skills and experience: **

- 5+ years of hands-on experience successfully developing consumer-facing applications. Marketplace experience preferred but not essential

- You have a passion for music, live events and want to improve the market for musicians

- You have a resilient personality, seek autonomy and have a desire to build a business

- You are a focussed and creative problem-solver with an inquisitive and technical mindset

- You are a pro-active self-starter and enjoy working as part of a small team, rapidly iterating on approach and getting your hands dirty to deliver on the result

- Ability to communicate in English fluently, both written and spoken.

- Strong knowledge of React and Node.js (express) applications

- Experience with MongoDB as well as database design and optimisation.

- Ability to integrate and test third-party APIs based on documentation.

- Developed applications with major cloud services such as AWS.

- Experience with testing tools such as mocha, chai and sinon

- Strong understanding of version control and development operations.

- Outstanding attention to detail.

**What GigZoo offers:**

- Exciting, passionate and friendly team that work hard and have fun

- Responsibility, autonomy and a voice at the table from day one with the opportunity to grow into a CTO role

- You will be instrumental in the growth of a disruptive start-up backed by capital from leading investors across Europe

- Generous compensation package comprised of base salary, performance related bonus and equity ownership package

- 38 days annual leave (including bank holidays)

- Learning, development, and networking opportunities across the entertainment and tech industries

- Professional development, health and wellbeing budget

- Central London office (Finsbury Circus) with a flexible working culture – we like to give freedom but also value the power of collaboration

- A day off to volunteer for a cause of your choice

- Defined contribution pension

**NO RECRUITMENT AGENCIES**
